verbs.description: [ARG1: russian missile defenses] [V: arrive] [ARG4: in syria] [ARGM-ADV: the us like israel has vowed to continue operations in syria until iran backs off with a very small ground presence in syria the us largely relies on air power to protect its forces israel iran foundation for defense of democracies us syria russia]
